data.en: Objective 7. Guarantee access for all to reliable, sustainable and modern energy services at an affordable cost7.1 By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services7.1.3. National electricity supply (Mw)5/1/2020 12:00:00 AMMHEM / REGIDESOWAKANA FerdinandMHEM statistics and planning departmentSDG focal point at MHEM(+257) 799772981156 BUJUMBURAwakanafer@yahoo.frIt is the quantity of electricity available to the country, consisting of electricity produced locally and imported. This quantity can be used locally or exportedGiga watt hour (GWH)REGIDESO, annual reportCentralized database operation, collection is done dailyThe probable date of the next collection will be 2020In 2021MHEN / REGIDESOISTEEBU is responsible for compiling this indicator at the national levelISTEEBU is the body recognized by the Burundian government for the collection, processing and dissemination of official statistics helping in planning and decision-making.The indicator is relevant because it reflects the level of electricity coverageThe numerator may not be exhaustive because some households supplied with electricity are not registered with REGIDESO.
